articles.title: Ford Recalls Over 272,000 Vehicles Amid Software Glitch
articles.mainIdea: Ford Recalls Over 272,000 Vehicles Amid Software Glitch
articles.summary: Zacks: Ford Recalls Over 272,000 Vehicles Amid Software Glitch. Ford is recalling over 272,000 EVs and hybrids due to a software glitch that can prevent vehicles from properly engaging park, raising crash risks. Related tickers mentioned: F, FSS, REVG.
